title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Remote Blended Physiology Collaborative Project

context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain physiological concepts (e.g., cardiac cycle, nerve conduction) using mathematical modeling.
Learners can perform remote team projects using web-based collaboration tools (e.g., Adobe Connect).
Learners can analyze and present physiological experiment data in real-time via video conferencing systems (e.g., Polycom).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
